definitions.definition: The act or process of infiltrating , as of water into a porous substance, or of a fluid into the cells of an organ or part of the body.

subdefinitions.definition: process by which water on the ground surface enters the soil.

definitions.definition: The substance which has entered the pores or cavities of a body.
The act of secretly entering a physical location and/or organization.

main_definition: The act or process of infiltrating , as of water into a porous substance, or of a fluid into the cells of an organ or part of the body.
secondary_definitions: The substance which has entered the pores or cavities of a body.
The act of secretly entering a physical location and/or organization.
